https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dYafBJeexgcWfxxpQsjAI0M9vyP.jpg A heartfelt adventure about a milquetoast accountant, Medor, whose perfect life is ruined when he discovers his wife having an affair with his boss. Having lost everything, he finds refuge in his estranged, deadbeat nephew and together, they chase his old, forgotten dream: opening a restaurant. American Bistro
